items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities and progress with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow users to control who can see their posts
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds
Privacy settings must comply with relevant data protection regulations

items.title: Friends and Following System
items.description: Allow users to connect with friends and follow other users to see their activities.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by name or email
User can send and accept friend requests
User can follow/unfollow other users without mutual consent
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second
System should handle up to 10,000 friend connections per user

notes: The requirement was vague; assumed core social features include activity sharing and friend/follow system. Additional features like leaderboards or challenges may be considered later.
